item.title: Coming Soon Hugo Theme
item.description: Coming soon is a hugo theme which can be used before publishing your actual site to build hype or to just have something on your domain while you develop your site. Note: all variables in { } should be personalised Setup Make a new hugo site hugo new site {sitename} cd {sitename} git clone https://github.com/mansoorbarri/coming-soon.git themes/coming-soon Copy examplesite/config.toml files to yours for quick setup cp themes/coming-soon/examplesite/config.toml . Open config.toml and edit as per your liking.
